name: Radar Chaos Free
description:
The full version of this app is on sale this week for only
99 cents! Reg. $4.99

Radar Chaos is a highly realistic air traffic control game. The radar that you see in this simulation is precisely what is used in the real world of air traffic control.

The full version offers ten different levels. This free version offers just two levels. Give them a try, then be sure to download the full version.

Can you handle the stressful job of an air traffic controller? Put your nerves to the test with Radar Chaos. There are ten different levels, the first four being very good 'beginner' levels.

Separate all aircraft by 1000 feet vertically, or by 3 miles laterally. Avoid mountains and restricted airspace. Guide arriving passenger jets onto approach paths, while keeping departing aircraft clear.

Radar Chaos is a fine balance between 'a fun game' and a 'realistic air traffic control simulation'.
